questions.question: Gauss Seidel with relaxation method is _______________________

answers.a: will not effect the number of iterations to achieve the desired accuracy
answers.b: may reduce the number of iterations to reach the desired accuracy
answers.c: always reduces the number of iterations to achieve the desired accuracy

questions.question: In Gauss Seidel with relaxation method _______________________

answers.a: always older iteration values are used
answers.b: always latest iteration values are used
